resources.string: Welcome to Reseepe, Your Gateway to Inclusive Culinary Adventures!
Scan Your Ingredients: Find Recipes Instantly!
Discover delicious recipes with the ingredients you have on hand. Simply upload an image of your ingredients to get started!
Make sure your photo is clear and well-lit, like the example below!

Indonesian fried rice, known as Nasi Goreng, is a flavorful stir-fried rice dish. It\'s different from other fried rice variations because it uses a special sweet soy sauce called kecap manis, which gives it a unique sweet and savory taste. It often includes ingredients like shrimp paste for umami, aromatics like shallots and garlic, and protein like chicken or shrimp.
What are we going to cook today?
Are you sure want to logout?
How do I use the Scan Page feature to get recipe suggestions?

Tap the "Scan Page" icon in the bottom navigation bar. You can take a photo of your ingredients with your camera or choose one from your gallery. The app will identify the ingredients and suggest recipes you can make with them. This helps you use what you have and reduce food waste.
How do I add a recipe to my bookmarks?

To add a recipe to your bookmarks, tap the bookmark icon on the recipe. If the bookmark icon is filled with color, it means the recipe has been saved. You can view the recipes you have bookmarked in the "Bookmarked Recipes" section from the bottom navigation bar.
How do I get personalized recipe recommendations?

To get personalized recipe recommendations, go to the "Home" tab where you will find a section for recommended recipes. These recommendations are based on your previous interactions, bookmarked recipes, and the ingredients you frequently use. This ensures that you always have fresh and relevant recipe suggestions.

Welcome to Reseepe, your ultimate cooking companion app designed to make meal planning and cooking effortless and enjoyable. Whether you\'re a seasoned chef or just starting out in the kitchen, Reseepe is here to inspire you with delicious recipes tailored to your preferences and ingredients.

1. Scan Page: Use the innovative Scan Page feature to take a photo of your ingredients and receive instant recipe suggestions.
 
2. Bookmark Your Favorites: Easily save your favorite recipes to revisit them later for quick access.
 
3. Recipe Recommendations: Get personalized recipe recommendations based on your taste preferences and available ingredients.

At Reseepe, we believe that cooking should be fun, creative, and accessible to everyone. Our mission is to empower home cooks by providing them with the tools and inspiration they need to create delicious meals effortlessly. Whether you\'re planning a weeknight dinner or preparing for a special occasion, Reseepe is your trusted companion in the kitchen.

Download Reseepe today and embark on a culinary journey filled with delightful flavors and endless possibilities. Join our community of food enthusiasts and experience the joy of cooking like never before!
